features: REGULAR ABSORBENCY TAMPONS: ROSE organic tampons offer you a wide range of absorbances, from light to super
APPLICATOR FREE, ECO-CONSCIOUS: Easy no applicator digital insertion tampons with rounded tip and minimum environmental impact.

PERFECT FIT, SAFE USE: Each tampon is wrapped individually for hygienic purposes. Easy carrying and access. contains a unique security veil covering the absorbent core to prevent fiber shedding during removal
NATURAL JUST LIKE YOU: We care about your body - 100% biodegradable, viscose/rayon free, no chlorine or dioxin used, no perfume, simply pure. Period
body.description: Say goodbye to synthetic materials and harsh chemicals with our 100% organic cotton non-applicator tampons! These little bundles of friendly goodness are just what your lady parts need for a natural and gentle time of the month. Not only are they better for your body, but they're also better for the environment. Traditional tampons often contain synthetic materials that take forever to break down, but our organic tampons are organic, so you can feel good about your impact on the planet. Plus, without an applicator, they're sleek, discreet and easy to use on-the-go, so you can have peace of mind all day long. So, give your body the natural love it deserves and make the switch to our organic non-applicator tampons. Your body (and the planet) will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tampons are hard for me post baby!! These are quality!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After having my baby things were just different. Tampons hurt, or were difficult to use. I couldn’t quite get them in right. The most annoying thing even before having a baby was when the applicator was hard to push, or I’d accidentally pinch myself. Hard to navigate “in there” with how far or shallow to insert… I’m so glad I found these. As someone with a heavy flow, these were not nearly as messy as I thought!! Or maybe my flow is better since going non toxic?? No mess, so don’t let that scare you. After reading the reviews I was comforted knowing most parts of the world use this, so as someone from the USA, having never heard of such a thing as no applicator tampons, I figured it’s worth a try if others do it! I’m never going back. It’s so much easier to apply the tampon in the right spot. Less toxins have actually helped my period pain and flow. As you can see from the video, you can see the quality in the cotton and how it’s molded. The cheaper non organic brand has “fly aways” and seems to open prematurely. I don’t want to imagine “fly aways” stuck in my vagina or beyond… I 100% recommend these tampons.
